sen.j: 駿河 次郎（するが じろう、生没年不詳）は、平安時代末期の人物で源義経の郎党。
sen.e: Jiro SURUGA (birth and death date unknown) lived in the late Heian Period and was a vassal of MINAMOTO no Yoshitsune.

sen.e: Later, he followed Yoshitsune to the Battles of Uji River, Ichinotani, Yakushima and Dannoura.

sen.j: 平氏滅亡後、『源平盛衰記』では義経の命で捕虜となった平宗盛の子・平能宗を斬る。
sen.e: According to the "Genpei Seisui ki" (Rise and Fall of the Minamoto and the Taira clans), after the decline of the Taira clan, he killed TAIRA no Munemori's child, TAIRA no Yoshimune, who was a captive, at the orders of Yoshitsune.

sen.e: In "Gikeiki" (a military epic about the life of Yoshitsune),, he warded off the assassin Shoshin TOSANOBO, who had received an imperial order to attack Yoshitsune, and beheaded him at Rokujo Kawara riverbank..
